body:
You might want to try splitting your coins. It could take several tries but
should work eventually.

Anyway, support requests should be directed to Bitcoin stack exchange

On Nov 4, 2017 20:10, "Rebroad" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> From what I have read, if some miners go ahead with SegWit2X then there's
> a risk of transactions made using bitcoin-qt will also be valid on the
> SegWit2X fork - is this true? If so, can something be done to ensure that
> TXs are valid only on the non-SegWit2X fork?
